item.description:
Our next meeting will be Thursday, March 21 at 7 PM. Come with your helpful hints, challenges and any information you want or need to share.

It's been a long time and I'm anxious to see how you weathered the winter. We've had an unusually cold winter here in AZ but I won't complain too much.

I am going to talk about Tommie Copper compression clothing and my recent experience with it and the experience of my clients. Pretty interesting. If anyone has purchased some and used it with success please send me an email at btzee6@gmail.com.
item.name: lets have a meetup
